dir.description: Path to Terraform project directory. Path is relative to CWD, unless an absolute path is specified.

state.description: Path to read and save state. Defaults to "terraform.tfstate", Path is relative to "dir"

target.description: Resource to target. Operation will be limited to this resource and its dependencies. Accepts a single resource string or an array of resources

var.description: Set Terraform variables, expects a hash with key value pairs representing variables and values.

var_file.description: Set variables in the Terraform configuration from a file. Path is relative to "dir". Accepts a single var-file path or an array of paths

state_out.description: Path to write state to that is different than "state". This can be used to preserve the old state.
